entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
